Spacious room for rent in a 4BR apartment lease starts Aug 1st
The apartment is located close to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, and Franklin Ave. The subway 3 line is right outside of the apartment also the 2, 3, 4, 5 at Franklin avenue. Also, in the area is a very nice wash & fold laundry drop off.

You will be living with three friendly and chill roommates in their late-20`s. Leiana works in advertising and Noah a personal trainer. In our free time, Leiana tends to be at the dance studio a lot aside from that she loves designing, drawing or bar hopping with friends. Weekends we all love to explore the city, hang with friends outdoors!
We are looking for clean, respectful, responsible and employed people also in their mid-20`s to early 30`s. Don`t mind a good time just don`t bring the party home every-night! We`d like to have a few bbq`s on the rooftop before the summer/fall is over! No drama please!
Again, this is a one-yr lease and proof of income & credit is required to be on the lease.
If you think this is a good fit for you send an email with a little info about yourself and a contact #!
Also put "I LOVE NY" in your subject line so we know its not spam :)

annotations.source_heading: Large room for rent - (heat and hot water incl.)

postings.heading: Large room for rent - heat and hot water incl.

postings.body:
Available 08/06 to 08/17
Construction Special: Only $70 per night (includes taxes) plus $120 cleaning fee
**Construction Special**
They will be replacing the walkways and stairs on our building from 08/06 to 08/17 and 09/02 through 09/06. You will still have FULL ACCESS to the condo and full access to the lanai area. Unit is on the ground floor so it will be much less of an impact than top floor condos. Workers will be present from 8 to 5 daily and there will be noise, so we are cutting our rates by 40%. Most people in Maui are out exploring during the day; anyways, so it may not be an issue. You will still have full use of the tennis court, swimming pool, lanai, and hot tub. Take advantage of this "40% Off Special". This is the lowest price we have EVER offered for our condo. Contact us now for this super special rate. :)
Welcome to PARADISE. . .
Our condo is situated in a perfectly central location. It is within easy walking distance (less than 1 mile) to EVERYTHING: shops, restaurants, beaches, public parks, grocery stores, mini marts, kayaking, surfing, snorkeling, wind surfing, fishing, medical facilities, craft fairs, open fruit/veggie markets, fast food, a popular nightclub with dancing/live music: you name it! It`s all literally around the corner. As an added bonus, there is a bus stop right at the entrance of the condo complex, and you are just minutes away from all the "picture perfect", high-end resorts in both Wailea and Makena. The airport in Kahului is only 10 miles away.
Perhaps the best part of all, though, is you are directly across the street (less than 300 footsteps) from the beach/ocean and Maui`s only Whale Education Center! Along with the beach/ocean, you will discover a beautiful beach park (complete with outdoor showers, picnic tables, port potties, and totally free parking) - make sure you check out all of our beach and park photos of the area directly across the street.
Guests will have access to a really nice pool, lots of comfy pool loungers, a great BBQ area with grills and picnic tables, an outdoor shower, outdoor restrooms, and even an extra-large hot tub. There is also a tennis court on site and trees on property with free bananas, limes, avocados, and papayas.
This fully-equipped, 500 square foot studio has cold AC, four fans, and a very comfortable Queen sized murphy bed made up with fresh linens & pillows to settle into after a full day of adventures around the island. The closet provides plenty of space to hang your clothes and store your personal belongings.
If there are more than 2 guests, there is a sofa sleeper that makes into a Queen bed along with soft, fresh smelling sheets and fluffy pillows.
The kitchen is stocked with a large variety of household goods and cookware. There is a brand new full-sized refrigerator with ice maker (purchased July 23, 2014). You will also find a full sized dishwasher, a stove/oven, and a microwave.
Small appliances include a rice maker, toaster, coffee maker, toaster oven, and blender. In addition, we happily provide paper towels, dish soap, garbage bags, sponges, dishwasher soap, and an assortment of spices.
Your bathroom comes fully stocked with a hair dryer, toilet paper, Kleenex, hand soap, beach towels, bath towels, and washcloths. There is also a very nice, sparkly clean, fully tiled shower and brand new toilet (Purchased July 18, 2014). The large vanity gives you plenty of space for your toothbrush, razor, make-up, and other personal belongings.
On the private outdoor lanai, there is an awesome sitting area (perfect for resting, reading, meditating, enjoying a refreshing cocktail, and/or outdoor dining). This peaceful area overlooks tropical courtyards; including a very large and fragrant pink plumeria tree that is sure to delight your soul and rejuvenate your spirit! Very romantic in the evening with the lanai door open, golden sunset rays streaming in through the tree branches as a tropical breeze gently cools the condo.
To save our guests money, we provide 2 tennis rackets, tennis balls, several coolers, 3 beach chairs, a beach umbrella, and even a boogie board. In addition, the mandatory Hawaii State Tax of 13.42% is ALREADY INCLUDED in your daily price, and WIFI plus on-site parking is TOTALLY FREE.
We also offer a house phone (plus answering machine) with complimentary calls to Canada, Mexico, or anywhere within the United States. Cable TV is included with 77 channels on a 40" (flat screen) Smart TV with Netflix capabilities. There is also a DVD player and DVD library. Additionally, you will have WIFI, a stereo system with CD player, a nice collection of chapter books, and the most popular guidebook ever written on Maui called Maui Revealed.
Other on-site items include an alarm clock, step stool, broom/dustpan, vacuum, iron/ironing board, and even an apron for cooking.
For your convenience, there is a very affordable, coin-operated laundromat just steps away with 20 brand new, full-sized machines. The cost is only $1.25 for washing and $1.00 to dry.
It is a known fact that sunny Kihei has the best climate in Maui - warm weather year-round with the lowest precipitation on the island! In addition, Kihei is known as the pivoting point to all Maui activities. With six miles of sun-kissed beaches, it`s no secret why Kihei has boomed into the island`s largest tourist destination.
In addition, you are less than two blocks away from the world famous Sugar Beach -- the only FIVE-MILE BEACH WALK in all of Maui!
After booking, always remember to consult your local insurance provider about the benefits of travel insurance.
As a special bonus, daily maid service and/or mid stay cleans are available for an additional fee. All information is conveniently displayed inside the condo.
THE TROPICAL VIBRATIONS & MAGIC OF MAUI AWAIT YOU...
If you have any questions, feel free to email me anytime. I will answer all questions within 24 hours - GUARANTEED!
Don`t delay, book today, our guests love it, and you will, too!!!!
This IS a LEGAL vacation rental. :)
Tax ID: W40883638-01
I am looking forward to speaking with you and sharing my ALOHA spirit.

This LARGE 1+ BR 1BA apartment is one the first floor of a multi-family on Mass Ave in Arlington Heights. There is a large living room, huge bedroom with an overabundance of closet space, an additional room which can be used as an office and an eat-in kitchen. The bath was renovated in the past few years. There is a small covered porch in the back of the house. The unit has wall to wall carpet throughout. Parking for 1 car is provided off-street with additional quest parking. Please note that there are no laundry facilities available on site, but the Laundromat is a very short distance away. Heat is by gas and tenant pays for all of their own utilities.
This unit is located directly on the Minuteman Path. Trader Joe`s and all of the fine shops of Arlington Heights are just a short distance away as are buses to Harvard, Porter and Alewife. Lexington Center is about 2 miles away directly down Mass Ave. Easy access to routes 2 and 128.
Sorry, no pets and smoking is not permitted inside the home.
